info.name: Ultimate Whovian Dash (Ultimate 2013 fix)
info.description:
***LOTS OF FIXES FOR RECENT TUMBLR CHANGES*** (ifsome bugs remain, please update, and if it continues, message me ) Based off the original Ultimate Whovian Dash by circlemaze. Adapted from the recent fixes posted by hideheader. Fixes and tweaks to make your Tumblr dashboard a better Doctor Who experience after the September 2013 update that broke a lot of userstyle themes!
  • Top Icons HOME — The TARDIS! INBOX — A hypercube: my rendition of the Time Lord mail thingie as seen in The Doctors Wife. HELP — K-9: The Doctor's little helper =) SETTINGS — Bowtie: because he's always fixing it. LOGOUT — A Dalek: because EXTERMINATE!
  • New Post Icons Gallifreyan icons.
  • Time-cracked Tumblr Logo
  • "Return to top" button Modified 11th's era TARDIS logo.
  • Selector The classic TARDIS key. I never got why they stopped using this layout, it's beautiful.
info.additionalInfo: Works on all Tumblr dashboard pages. Including Messages, Settings, Help, etc... Sept 4 - 5th: - More fixes with some settings pages still losing their white background - *Several* fixes for Firefox (sorry!) - Fixed some pages, settings, etc, losing their white background. - Fixed "Follow/Message/Dashboard" links on user blogs having black backgrounds (YAY!) - Removed that annoying gradient below the tumblr radar! *** Sorry No Screwdriver cursor included, this is a personal choice. You can install it here: Ultimate Whovian [Module VI] — Sonic Screwdriver *** Disclaimer/Credit:This is not all my work. Thanks to circlemaze for being the one who made it in the beginning, and to hideheader who put lots of work into the initial fixes I would not have been motivated to work on further if it weren't for them.

data.title: So, you nicked my code AND my screenshot?
